title: New Cryptojacking Attack Targets Docker API to Create Malicious Swarm Botnet
description: Cybersecurity researchers have uncovered a new cryptojacking campaign targeting the Docker Engine API with the goal of co-opting the instances to join a malicious Docker Swarm controlled by the threat actor.
